settings.title: Entry-Level Package
settings.description:
✅ Mining Masterclass – Save weeks of research with this insider’s guide.

✅ Mining Career Roadmap – Discover how to climb the ranks in mining.

✅ Entry-Level Resume & Cover Letter – Tailored to land your first mining job.

✅ Site-Ready Course – Master medicals, logistics and arrive ready to impress from day one.

🎁 BONUS: FREE White Card CPCWHS1001 – Valid in all Australian states (Valued at $125+).

💵 Earning Potential: Start earning $80k–$120k/year!

💡 Total Value: $500+

🚀 Your Investment: $199

settings.title: Career Growth Package
settings.description:
Includes everything in the Entry-Level Package, plus:

✅ Personalized Career Coaching – 20-minute session to map your goals and strategy.

✅ 3x Custom Job-Specific Resumes & Cover Letters – Showcasing technical and leadership skills.

✅ Interview Prep Guide – Boost confidence and master tricky questions.

✅ 30-Day Interview Guarantee – Land interviews or get continued support until you do.

💵 Earning Potential: Position yourself for $120k–$180k/year!

💡 The ultimate mid-career accelerator—step into roles with more responsibility and higher pay.

settings.title: Management Package
settings.description:
Includes everything in the Career Growth Package, plus:

✅ Exclusive Executive Career Coaching – 60-minute personalized session to identify leadership opportunities, set goals, and navigate the challenges of managing large teams.

✅ Custom Management-Level Resume & LinkedIn Profile Optimization – Highlight your leadership, technical expertise, and vision for executive recruiters.

✅ Advanced Interview Prep Guide – Tackle high-level questions, present your leadership style, and ace hiring panels for management roles.

✅ Professional Networking Mastery Guide – Build meaningful connections with industry executives, decision-makers, and influencers.

✅ 90-Day Interview Guarantee – If you don’t land interviews for senior roles within 90 days, we’ll continue to work with you until you succeed.

✅ Priority Support & Unlimited Revisions – Get expedited help and unlimited updates to your documents to stay ahead.

💵 Earning Potential: Command $180k–$320k/year in leadership roles!

💡 Take control of your career—position yourself as a trusted leader, land high-paying roles, and secure your place at the top of the mining industry.
